passages.text: SALLOS: I'm putting together a stew with some stock cubes I brought along with me—there's no meat in here, don't worry. [[Continue.->parchment]]
passages.name: "What're you making?"

passages.text:
His ears perk up when he hears your reassurances, and he breathes a sigh of relief.
[[Continue.->continueReally]]
passages.name: Really.

passages.text: SALLOS: Hey, how are you holding up? [[I'm fine.->fine]] [[I'm beat!->beat]]
passages.name: sallos

passages.text: SALLOS: Hey, what's up? Need anything? (if: $hasWood is true)[ [[Present the firewood.->giveFirewood]] ] (if: $hasTinder is true)[ [[Present the tinder.->giveTinder]] ] (if: $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is false)[ [[I forgot what I needed to do.->forgot]] ] [[I'm alright.->sallosTalkedToExit]]

links.name: I forgot what I needed to do.

passages.name: SallosTalkedTo

passages.text:
A short Ifni gives a puzzled look back at you, his ears turning to the sounds around you: the howling winds and the crackling fire, and his tail swaying side to side. He continues to eat.
[[Continue.->alright?]]
passages.name: Stare at him back.

passages.text: SALLOS: That's great! Here, just do this one, and we'll be fine. [[Unwrap it.->unwrap]]
passages.name: agreeToHelp

passages.text: SALLOS: You alright? I know you love watching my tail, but you haven't eaten much at all. [[Ah! I just...->itsOk]]
passages.name: alright?

passages.text: SALLOS: Awh, I'm sorry to hear that! But we just have a little bit more work to do. [[Continue.->work]]
passages.name: beat

passages.text:
Slowly, gently, you lower the cube into the water. The portions under the rolling waves begin to shimmer and dissolve, staining the water with a deep brown. Once most of the stock is submerged, you release it, letting it fully sink. Sallos does the same, and soon, the stew begins to thicken and become fragrant.
[[Continue.->timeToEat]]
passages.name: boil

passages.text:
You've already collect a fair amount of tinder. It'd probably be best for Sallos to take care of the firewood.
[[Leave.->exitDeadTree]]
passages.name: cannotCut

passages.text:
Your hands are already full of firewood. Best to let Sallos take care of these.
[[Leave.->exitGrabTinder]]
passages.name: cannotGrabTinder

passages.text: SALLOS: Thank you! [[Continue.->sallosEat]]
passages.name: continueReally

passages.text: SALLOS: Are you excited to reach the top? We've been waiting for years for this, haven't we? [[When do we get to the top?->whenTop]]

links.name: When do we get to the top?

passages.name: continueUnwrap

passages.text:
After some effort, you manage to get together a small bundle of logs. Enough to last the night, you reckon.
[[Leave.->exitDeadTree]]
(set: $hasWood to true)
passages.name: cut

passages.text:
The stove is quiet and depressing. Get it lit!
(if: $hasWood is true) [ [[Place the logs down by the stove.->placeLogs]] ]
(if: $hasKindling is true) [ [[Place the kindling down by the stove.->placeKindling]] ]

links.name: Place the logs down by the stove.
Place the kindling down by the stove.

passages.name: deadStove

passages.text:
The fallen tree collects snow. It seems to have fallen recently, judging by how little snow is atop the trunk. Did you hear it fall? The sound was probably drowned out by the wind.
(if: $talkedToSallos is true and $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is false)[ [[Cut some logs->cut]] ]
(if: $talkedToSallos is true and $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is true)[ [[Cut some logs->cannotCut]] ]
[[Leave.->exitDeadTree]]
passages.name: deadTree

passages.text: SALLOS: ... [[Continue.->salloshoveInMouth]]
passages.name: eatAnyways

passages.text:
You close your eyes do your best to conjure up an image of the sharpest edge you can imagine in your mind. Your head begins to ache slightly, but as you open your eyes, you see that the hatchet's head has regained its sharpness, the edge gaining a shiny coating contrasting with the surrounding rust and abuse.
[[Leave.->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: edgeFormed

passages.text: (set: $sallosWalkIn to true)
passages.name: exitPlaceStove

passages.text: (set: $talkedToSallos to true)
passages.name: exitQuestGive

passages.text: (set: $eatCutscene to true)
passages.name: exitTimeToEat

passages.text: SALLOS: Glad to hear it! We still have some work to do, though. [[Continue.->work]]
passages.name: fine

passages.text: SALLOS: Oh! You just need to get some firewood or tinder for me. There's a hatchet by the deadwood over there, and I think I saw good spot for foraging tinder a bit further past that. [[Thank you.->sallosTalkedToExit]]
passages.name: forgot

passages.text:
Most of these are soaked through. Unsuitable for kindling.
[[Continue.->exitPinecones]]
passages.name: getPinecones

passages.text: SALLOS: Amazing! I already got the tinder and some kindling as well. Let's go inside the tent, and get the fire started! [[Continue->exitSallosQuest]]
passages.name: giveFirewood

passages.text: SALLOS: Amazing! I already got the firewood and some kindling as well. Let's go inside the tent, and get the fire started! [[Continue->exitSallosQuest]]
passages.name: giveTinder

passages.text:
You've gathered some tinder.
(set: $hasTinder to true)
[[Leave.->exitGrabTinder]]
passages.name: grabTinder

passages.text:
The hatchet sits in on the ground quietly, resting after its long day of work.
(if: $sharpendHatchet is false) [ [[Take a closer look.->hatchetLookCloser]] ]
(if: $sharpendHatchet is true) [ [[Take a closer look.->sharpHatchetLookCloser]] ]
[[Leave.->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: hatchet

passages.text:
You pick it up, and take a closer look at the head. It's been worn down after years of use. It's edge is chipped, and rust dots the surface. You could try to use some of your magic to reshape and restore it.
[[Sharpen the hatchet.->sharpen]]
passages.name: hatchetLookCloser

passages.text: SALLOS: I could use some help unpacking these though, if you'd like to help. They're on tight! [[Sure!->agreeToHelp]] [[I think I'll keep looking around a bit first.->exitHelp]]

links.name: I think I'll keep looking around a bit first.

passages.name: help

passages.text: SALLOS:Yes! I'm really happy you like it! [[Continue.->sallosEat]]
passages.name: itsGood

passages.text: SALLOS: It's fine, I get it. But you probably should finish up soon. We need to get to bed and ready for tomorrow! You're gonna need that energy! [[Finish eating.]]
passages.name: itsOk

passages.text: SALLOS: Like it? I tried to make it as tasty as possible without using meat. How’d I do? [[It's good!->itsGood]] [[It's bad!->itsBad]]
passages.name: likeIt

passages.text:
He swallows, and picks up another spoonful.
[[Stare at him back.]]
passages.name: lookAt

passages.text:
He pulls out a handful of parchment wrapped cubes, tied with pieces of string.
[[Continue.->help]]
passages.name: parchment

passages.text:
The pinecones peek through the snow, their scales slighty ajar.
(if: $talkedToSallos is true)[ [[Gather a few->getPinecones]] ]
[[Leave.->exitNoGrabPinecones]]
passages.name: pinecones

passages.text:
You place the bundle of sticks by the stove.
[[Continue.->exitPlaceStove]]
passages.name: placeKindling

passages.text:
You place the bundle of sticks by the stove.
[[Continue.->exitPlaceStove]]
passages.name: placeLogs

passages.text: SALLOS: Really? [[Really.]] [[No.->eatAnyways]]
passages.name: reassure

passages.text:
Sallos sits by the pot, watching the water slowly heat up.
[["What're you making?"]]
passages.name: sallosDiscussion

passages.text: SALLOS: Would you like to help? [[Just a minute.->exitHelpRepeat]]
passages.name: sallosDiscussionRepeat

passages.text:
Sallos puts a spoonful of stew into his mouth.
[[Continue.->lookAt]]
passages.name: sallosEat

passages.text:
Sallos shoves a spoonful of stew into his mouth.
[[Continue.->lookAt]]
passages.name: salloshoveInMouth

passages.text: SALLOS: It's crazy to think that I had to save you up here when we first met. Remember that? We barely spoke each other's languages! Haha. [[Continue.->waterBoiling]]
passages.name: saveEulyss

passages.text:
Your legs are burning, and your breathing is labored. But you and Sallos have finished pitching the tent.
[[Finally, We're done! The tent is all set up!->wear]]

links.name: Finally, We're done! The tent is all set up!

passages.name: scene

passages.text:
Thanks to your efforts, the hatchet has been sharpened to a razor's edge.
[[Leave.->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: sharpHatchetLookCloser

passages.text:
You focus your mana, and touch the blade. You feel as is a wind is blowing across your arm, and the axe head begins to glow blue, and it begins to deform and almost melt.
(set: $strength += 1)
(set: $sharpenedHatchet to true)
[[Continue.->edgeFormed]]
passages.name: sharpen

passages.text: SALLOS: Alright! Time to grub! [[Leave.->exitTimeToEat]]
passages.name: timeToEat

passages.text:
Ther is a pile of pine branches and needles on the ground before you.
(if: $talkedToSallos is true and $hasTinder is false and $hasWood is false)[ [[Forage for tinder.->grabTinder]] ]
(if: $talkedToSallos is true and $hasTinder is false and $hasWood is true)[ [[Forage for tinder.->cannotGrabTinder]] ]
[[Leave.->exitTinder]]
passages.name: tinder

passages.text:
You begin to work through the knot, but it's a struggle to get a hold of each line of string.
[[Continue.->continueUnwrap]]
passages.name: unwrap

passages.text: SALLOS: Look, the water's come to a full boil! You should put the stock cube in! [[Gingerly place the cube into the bubbling sea.->boil]]

links.name: Gingerly place the cube into the bubbling sea.

passages.name: waterBoiling

passages.text:
Sallos doesn’t look any worse for wear, despite him outpacing you the whole trek up, and doing most of the heavy lifting setting up the tent.
[[Continue.->exitScene]]
passages.name: wear

passages.text: SALLOS: Hmmm... we should be there by tomorrow afternoon. We'll make camp there and watch the sun set! I'm telling you, it'll be beautiful! [[I can't wait, either!->saveEulyss]]
passages.name: whenTop

passages.text: SALLOS: There's a few dead trees around here. You should help me cut some firewood. Or you can go look for tinder—pine needles or anything else that's tiny and dry will work. [[Leave.->exitQuestGive]]
passages.name: work

passages.text: SALLOS: Awhh... He looks down dejectedly. [[I'm just kidding!->reassure]] [[It's okay, I'll still eat it!->eatAnyways]]

links.name: It's okay, I'll still eat it!

passages.name: itsBad
